title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and server for running large language models locally (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc.) with a simple API and Docker support.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, list and delete models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as LLM, chat and embedding components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (chat, playground, model manager) that talks to any local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI with conversation history, prompt templates and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library providing synchronous & asynchronous APIs for Ollama endpoints.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store + Streamlit UI.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration offering OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder nodes for pipelines.

title: ollama Discord bot
summary: Official lightweight Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET SDK for Ollama supporting .NET 6+ and Unity.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama server and models on Kubernetes with GPU node selection.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines for reproducible LLM tests.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-camunda
summary: Camunda 8 connector that invokes Ollama models from BPMN service tasks for low-code AI workflows.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir wrapper using Finch/Tesla for chat, generate and embeddings with GenServer pooling.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake delivering Ollama binary, CUDA variants and NixOS module with systemd service.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds “Ask Ollama” command to summarize or rewrite notes using local models.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform provider to declaratively pull and manage Ollama models on remote hosts via SSH.
